Hi all,

I've got this problem when I run a test that uses a specific
class=
 contained in a sealed jar:

java.lang.SecurityException: sealing violation=
: can't seal package
org.blah.util: already loaded

I got this class in my =
project:

org.blah.util.BlahLogger

And inside a sealed jar I got this clas=
s:

org.blah.util.BlahProperties

The classloader loads BlahLogger first, a=
nd when it tries load
BlahProperties (sealing the package from the jar)
I g=
et the above exception.

The thing is, this project is already running in T=
omcat 5.5.17 
without any problem.  This only happens when I try to unit te=
st
the business objects using junit 4.4.  I haven't tried it with
previous =
versions of junit.  I've already checked the classpath,
and there's no dupl=
ication of jars.

I'm using Eclipse 3.2.0 to run the tests.

Does anyone kn=
ow how to solve this problem?

Thanks in advance for any help.

Danniel.
